text: @WhiteHouse #Trump, #gop and #republicans are pissing on normal people....New unemployment claims totaled 2.981 million today. Bringing the total during the coronavirus crisis to 36.5 million. Economists were expecting 2.7 million claims. #trump2020 #TrumpGate #history #COVID #COVIDー19
